breakfast.name: Pan con Papas Fritas
breakfast.description: Freshly sliced baked bread stuffed with farm laid eggs comes with mixed Cheddar and Dairy Cream perfectly matched with Nutritious Fries will help you ease morning sickness.

breakfast.name: Longaniza con Arroz Fritos
breakfast.description: With just the aroma Angus Longaniza perfectly blended with seasoned Carbohydrate rich fried rice will let you have a reason to wake up every morning.

breakfast.name: Pasta with Angus Seasoned Sauce
breakfast.description: They say pasta themed foods improves life longetivity, why not consider our very own freshly seasoned Pasta comes with farm grown Angus Beef?

breakfast.name: Egg with Bacon Sandwich
breakfast.description: The crisp bacon, hard-boiled eggs and crunchy green onions make these cozy sandwiches look impressive when company drops by for lunch. Best of all, they're a snap to assemble.

breakfast.name: Croissant
breakfast.description: Hot and fluffy homemade French croissant toast served with diced bacons is a great company to start your day with
